descriptionHtml:
[b]Hi there :D[/b]

[u]Introduction:[/u]
This is my first file on the nexus so sorry if i make any mistakes, if I do, just let me know, ill make sure to take care of them :)
As the title already states, I decided to upload the savegame that I currently play on.
Disclaimer: This save is only the preset, feel free to do anything you like because you will start from lvl 1 anyway ^^

[u]Requirements:[/u]
SKSE
The Ningheim Race (obviously :P)
Apachii Skyhair
Racemenu
Kj Tattoos
THEHAGs Privat tattoos
!!! Alternate start !!! <- Very important, because the save starts there
[u]
Recommended:[/u]
Better females by bella
UNP Body replacer
Ultimate Assortment by Favoredsoul
Multiple UNP Mashup compilations by multiple people, e.g zzJay

I think thats it, maybe im forgetting something. Sorry in advance if i did.

Btw: Im working on making a follower out of her now, I already finished a version, but she neither has the body nor the facial tattoos at the moment, and I havent looked into the whole standalone-body-texture-stuff.
It will come though, im just a little short of time.

Well, thats about it, enjoy the save :)
[i]~SinjiiT[/i]
author: SinjiiT
